hymn.title: Let the Word of Christ dwell in you

lyrics.stanza: Let the word of Christ dwell in you Richly, in all wisdom Teaching and admonishing one another In psalms, and hymns, and spiritual songs, Singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord And whatever you do, in word or in work Do all in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, Do all in the name of our Lord.
